title: Was Kentucky placed under house arrest for refusing to sign the quarantine agreement?
subtitle: Elizabeth Lynscott told a local news channel that she didn't want approval before going to the emergency room. The court records reveal that there is more story.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A couple in Kentucky was placed under house arrest in July 2020, after a woman diagnosed with COVID-19 refused to agree to self-segregation because she was required to obtain prior consent to go to hospital.
